author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Genentech Says Follow-Up Phase 3 Data Showed Alecensa Reduced Risk Of Disease Progression By 57 Pct
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Genentech:
* FOLLOW-UP PHASE III DATA SHOWED GENENTECHâ€™S ALECENSA HELPED PEOPLE WITH ALK-POSITIVE METASTATIC NON-SMALL CELL LUNG CANCER LIVE A MEDIAN OF ALMOST THREE YEARS WITHOUT THEIR DISEASE WORSENING OR DEATH
* GENENTECH - FOLLOW-UP PHASE III DATA SHOWED ALECENSA REDUCED RISK OF DISEASE PROGRESSION/DEATH BY 57 PERCENT VERSUS CRIZOTINIB IN PEOPLE WITH ALK-POSITIVE METASTATIC NSCLC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
